[[_securityscheme]]
== Security

[[_default]]
=== Default
The Admin API supports admin credentials.
Credentials can be passed via HTTP headers (HTTP basic authentication).

[%hardbreaks]
__Type__ : basic


[[_none]]
=== None
No authentication is required for the <<_get_ping>> or <<_get_debug_vars>> endpoints.

[%hardbreaks]
__Type__ : basic
